CustomField.description: The amount the contractor has bid or has agreed to (unit pricing) in order to complete the additional work on a property. This will be the additional additional amount if the bid is attached to a recurring job or the total amount if it is a one time request.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: How much money does the contractor need to complete the job? For overgrowth or inhibiting completing a recurring service it will be the additional amount requested. For one time services/requests, it will be the total amount needed.
CustomField.label: Total Contractor Bid Amount
